job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Were looking for aspiring and talented developers who want to join our team We will give you the tools and knowledge to build amazing products and lift your career to new heightsltbrgtltbrgtIf you think about coding as craftsmanship have an academic or similar background in software engineering and want to learn how to build incredible software in record speeds youve come to the right placeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt24 years working as a developerltligtltligtBSc Computer Science Mathematics or any related degreerelevant experienceltligtltligtAll around player fast selflearning individualltligtltligtExperience working in a Linux environmentltligtltligtPassion for code craftsmanshipltligtltligtSmart problem solverltligtltligtLoves getting shit doneltligtltligtExperience developing customer facingwebapp products a plusltligtltligtExperience in server side Javascript Python or Ruby a plusltligtltulgt
